title: theeruna lOni
sahitya:
tIrunA lOni dugdha

anupallavi

 sAramau nI pAda sArasamu nAdu hrdayAra vindamuna beTTi kaTTu kOka

caraNam 1

 kamma viltuni ganna kAnti galigina hari mummAru pAlannamu bhujimpa beTTi
kammani viDa mosagi kaDu ratnamulu merayu tamma paDiganu baTTi tAnipuDu nilavakanu
   
caraNam 2

 anudinamunu nIdu padAbjamula nottucunu kanaka mayamu suraTi karamu niDi visari 
ghanamaina phaNi talpamuna nunci pADucunu kanulAra sEvinci kAlamula gaDapakanu
   
caraNam 3

 rAjAdhirAja sura rAja vandita pAda shrI jAnakIramaNa shrngAra jaladhE
rAja dharuDagu tyAgarAja pUjituDanucu rAjillu nI kIrti rAjiga bogaDakanu
